Detailed Description

Parameters structure of the APS_RegisterEndpointReq_t::APS_DataInd() function The function is determined by certain End Point. The APSDE-DATA.indication primitive.

Definition at line 437 of file aps.h.

Field Documentation

APS_AddrMode_t APS_DataInd_t::dstAddrMode

The addressing mode for the destination address used in this primitive and of the APDU that has been received. May possess any non-reserved value from the following list:
0x00 = reserved
0x01 = 16-bit group address for DstAddress; DstEndpoint is missing
0x02 = 16-bit address for DstAddress, DstEndpoint is present
0x03 - 0xff = reserved
Note: It will be convenient to use the APS_AddrMode_t values

Definition at line 446 of file aps.h.

APS_Address_t APS_DataInd_t::dstAddress

The individual device address or group address to which the ASDU is directed. Value size depends on the dstAddrMode parameter

Definition at line 449 of file aps.h.

Endpoint_t APS_DataInd_t::dstEndpoint

The target endpoint on the local entity to which the ASDU is directed.

Definition at line 451 of file aps.h.

APS_AddrMode_t APS_DataInd_t::srcAddrMode

The addressing mode for the source address used in this primitive and of the APDU that has been received. May possess any non-reserved value from the following list:
0x00 = reserved
0x01 = reserved
0x02 = 16-bit short address for SrcAddress, SrcEndpoint is present
0x03 = 64-bit extended address for SrcAddress, SrcEndpoint is present
0x04 - 0xff = reserved
Note: It will be convenient to use the APS_AddrMode_t values

Definition at line 460 of file aps.h.

APS_Address_t APS_DataInd_t::srcAddress

The individual device address of the entity from which the ASDU has been received. Value type and size is depend of the srcAddrMode parameter

Definition at line 463 of file aps.h.

Endpoint_t APS_DataInd_t::srcEndpoint

The number of the individual endpoint of the entity from which the ASDU has been received.

Definition at line 466 of file aps.h.

ProfileId_t APS_DataInd_t::profileId

The identifier of the profile from which this frame originates.

Definition at line 468 of file aps.h.

ClusterId_t APS_DataInd_t::clusterId

The identifier of the received object.

Definition at line 470 of file aps.h.

uint8_t APS_DataInd_t::asduLength

The number of octets comprising the ASDU being indicated by the APSDE.

Definition at line 472 of file aps.h.

uint8_t* APS_DataInd_t::asdu

The set of octets comprising the ASDU being indicated by the APSDE.

Definition at line 474 of file aps.h.

APS_Status_t APS_DataInd_t::status

The status of the incoming frame processing.

Definition at line 476 of file aps.h.

APS_Status_t APS_DataInd_t::securityStatus

UNSECURED if the ASDU was received without any security.
SECURED_NWK_KEY if the received ASDU was secured with the NWK key.
SECURED_LINK_KEY if the ASDU was secured with a link key.

Definition at line 480 of file aps.h.

uint8_t APS_DataInd_t::linkQuality

The link quality indication delivered by the NLDE.

Definition at line 482 of file aps.h.

uint32_t APS_DataInd_t::rxTime

Timestamp for the received packet based on the local clock, as provided by the NWK layer.
